titleStmt.title: A briefe chronicle of the foure principall empyres To witte, of Babilon, Persia, Grecia, and Rome. Wherein, very compendiously, the whole course of histories are conteined. Made by the famous and godly learned man Iohn Sleidan, and englished by Stephan Wythers.
De quatuor summis imperiis. English
titleStmt.author: Sleidanus, Johannes, 1506-1556.
Wythers, Stephen.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Rouland Hall, dwellyng in Gutter Lane, at the signe of the halfe Egle and the Keye,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: De quatuor summis imperiis.
Title page in two states: line 4 ends (1) "Wherein, very" or (2) "Wherein, is".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Gutter Lane, at the signe of the halfe Egle
